Known Flaw: Track 19 at about 1:50 scratches to a stop, then starts up again, then cuts out early again, and that's it. (Which is a bitch and a damn shame because it sounds killer. I have tried to find out further info but so far no luck. Seems to me to be an original defect of released CD, as the the time on the file matches that of the track listing on Discogs.)


Tracks 01-08 - Reading Festival, UK - 08/25/95 (SBD/FM) [partial fest set]
Tracks 09-11 - Later Studios, London, UK - 05/13/95 (Later with Jools Holland - TV)
Tracks 12-19 - Brixton Academy, London, UK - 05/04/95 (SBD/FM) [full fest set]  

Bonus Extra Track: 20 - Asking For It (from Reading 1995, not included on the boot -- it can be found on "My Body The Hand Grenade" and right hear.

...That must have been me on you and acid in the Great Woods, Mansfield MA, 1995-07-25 - Holepalooza!

Those were the daze, my friends.


The Hons Of Brixton (This Is My Academy!) is so fixin to kick in!

Meanwhile back in 2014-08-08 - The Pirate Bay around thewaymouth

For more hot Rock Chicks bliss kiss the stone that is thewaymouth on The Pirate Bay.

...The 20th Anniversary of Hole's classic 1994 album, 'Live Through This,' will be celebrated even if I have to just do it myself...


After Reading 1995, for Hole twas was but a couple more fests plus the MTV Awards, and then it was time to put one of the best and liveliest tours ever to rest is history.


Courtney, though you may not remember any of it, lucky for you and me some of us will never forget.


Ultimately even when you lose you will always win with us, we happy few, who will never ever forget or regret you.
